contributions.name: PlasmaTube
contributions.description: Maintainer, and added support for multiple video sources. Also features like Picture-in-Picture.

contributions.name: NeoChat
contributions.description: Added UnifiedPush support, misc bugs and interface changes.

contributions.name: Kirigami Add-ons
contributions.description: About KDE page, lots of bug fixes.

contributions.name: Knockout Web Client
contributions.description: Added Mastodon embeds, improved embedded content warnings.

contributions.name: KWin
contributions.description: Fixed pen tilt, other misc bug fixes.

contributions.name: Krita
contributions.description: Added pen tilt to the tablet tester.

contributions.name: Tokodon
contributions.description: Maintainer, added numerous features and fixed lots of bugs.

contributions.name: Dalamud
contributions.description: Fixed searching for plugins by punchline and other boring bugfixes.

contributions.name: MoltenVK
contributions.description: Enable base vertex instance support in shader conversion.

contributions.name: PrismLauncher
contributions.description: The about page, icon fixes, and cmark support for better Markdown rendering.

contributions.name: Plasma Desktop
contributions.description: Plasma 6 applet porting, added activity pins to launchers, bugfixing.

contributions.name: CATS
contributions.description: Minor bug fixes for it's baking.
